author: cms-patatrack
body:
#### PR description:

Data formats and algorithms for the HCAL local reconstruction running on GPU.
Implements the HBHE unpacking and the production of HCAL uncalibrated rechits, including the MAHI algorithm.

#### PR validation:

Changes in use in the Patatrack releases.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Includes changes from:
  - cms-patatrack#468: Implement HCAL local reconstruction on GPUs
  - cms-patatrack#470: Update HCAL local reconstruction on GPUs
  - cms-patatrack#483: Restructure code to work around CUDA build limitations
  - cms-patatrack#486: Apply code formatting
  - cms-patatrack#489: Remove duplicate dictionary definitions
  - cms-patatrack#491: Fix warnings about unused variables in HCAL GPU code
  - cms-patatrack#502: Update ECAL and HCAL reconstruction to run on multple GPUs [1/3]
  - cms-patatrack#505: Implement HCAL-only workflows on GPU
  - cms-patatrack#508: Update ECAL and HCAL reconstruction to run on multple GPUs [2/3]
  - cms-patatrack#523: Refactor common ECAL and HCAL code
  - cms-patatrack#526: Apply code formatting
  - cms-patatrack#527: Remove use of boost::mpl::vector for dependent records
  - cms-patatrack#531: Use up to 10 time samples for the HBHE digis in Run 3 MC 
  - cms-patatrack#532: Apply code checks and code format
  - cms-patatrack#543: HcalDigisProducerGPU: preallocate pinned host memory only if CUDA is available
  - cms-patatrack#555: Update ESProducers following cms-sw#31556
  - cms-patatrack#557: Move multifit/MAHI common code to DataFormats/CaloRecHit
  - cms-patatrack#565: Address HCAL review comments regarding CondFormats/HcalObjects
  - cms-patatrack#566: Reduce code duplication in CPU and GPU modules
  - cms-patatrack#567: Refactor ECAL and HCAL chi2 code
  - cms-patatrack#568: Address more HCAL review comments
  - cms-patatrack#569: Move common ESProducer templates to ConvertingESProducer(WithDependencies)T
  - cms-patatrack#572: Move the HCALGPUAnalyzer to RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecProducers/
  - cms-patatrack#574: Update GPU HCAL conditions framework
  - cms-patatrack#576: Synchronise GPU code with CPU updates
title: Patatrack integration - HCAL local reconstruction (8/N)
